name: Heart'n Block
description:
Cute and full of surprises block game with many twists mixed with cute girls.

Use your platform to launch and catch the only white heart shaped ball and use this same ball to destroy the colored blocks.
Curvy girls, weird shaped ceiling, heart shaped balls bouncing all around the place, colored special effects everywhere and obviously; blocks! will create a lot of surprises for you to enjoy.

Get ready for the fireworks!

Main features

- Game stage count : 100, yes 100. Stages will lead you to meet the girls one by one before mixing them up.

- In-game editor to create your own stages!
A little fact; all stages for the game were done with the editor.

- Range of 20 girls to bounce on for various diabolical and angelic special effects!

- Colorgasme assured with a range of 11 different blocks and balls with their own special effect.

- 3 settings for difficulty, choose one to suit your mood or try out the hellish one and get the perfect score.

- In-game encyclopedia to learn about the girls or the blocks.

- 4 ways to play : mouse, touch screen, keyboard and controller.
